title: Empire.io

content: Hey Bitcointalk and Empire.io Fans!This weekend, show off your favorite win on Empire.io, and you could walk away with 50 free spins on everybody's favorite game Gates of Olympus, completely wager-free!How to Join:Post a screenshot here of your favorite win from Empire.io between Friday 0:00 and Sunday 23:59.We pick our favorites!PM us on Bitcointalk with a screenshot of the win, along with your Empire.io username and your Bitcointalk profile link.Timeframe:The promo runs from 0:00 Friday 08/09 at 0:00 GMT to Sunday 10/09 at 23:59 GMT.Prize:Our top 20 favorite entries will each receive 50 free spins on Gates of Olympus, with zero wagering requirements!Prize Distribution:All free spins will be credited by Monday, 11/09, before 18:00 GMT.Rules:One entry per user.The screenshot needs to show date, time and Empire.io logo. The PMed screenshot needs to show the date, time, Empire.io logo, and usernameLet’s make this weekend a winning one! Good luck! Play now at Empire.io— Empire.io Team
